column4: hi i am trying to compile ardrone sdk on linux ubuntu 11.10 and i get this error http://pastebin.com/JyykmDqk any idea
in fact, it seems like none of those packages were installed, so install all of them
except libcwiid1-dev since that package doesn't exist anymore
i installed i get the same error
libavutil/avutil.h is in libavutil-dev so not all of them
there is a list at the start of your pastebin 'You should install the following packages...'
the packages is installed the makefile bash script file show always routine checking library from begin
yes, libcwiid1-dev doesn't exist anymore, install libcwiid-dev instead (but keep all the rest on that line)
i now it is installed for this reason i am confused why the make file show again that he need this file http://pastebin.com/bVLNViAT
just say no when it asks you to install the package, and it should move on with the compile
if not the code may need a bit of patching
http://pastebin.com/YSVrBKQq i typed no and the same problem
so you installed libavutil-dev? if so I am out of ideas
